mapper.insert: insert into members (id, password, nickname, email, phone, img) values (#{id}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{img})
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM members WHERE id = #{id} ) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS existsResult FROM DUAL
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM members WHERE id = #{id} AND email = #{email} ) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS existsResult FROM DUAL
